text:
The so-called “Disinformation Governance Board” never should have seen the light of day in the first place. Disbanding it is good news for free speech, and the administration’s censorship mission should be scrapped once and for all.

https://t.co/N2Mw1C9yli
And it's unconscionable that Attorney General Dana Nessel, the top law enforcement officer in our state, refuses to defend our law on the books and the legislature that writes the law.

It’s egregious that a judge with Planned Parenthood ties got to make a ruling on Michigan abortion law. The ruling must be appealed immediately and brought before a judge without such a clear conflict of interest.

https://t.co/aIQ0l2tz3y

Speaker Pelosi continues to stand in the way of critical legislation to unleash domestic energy production.

We need to pass the American Energy Independence from Russia Act. https://t.co/rSzg0L6fOM

Religious liberty is foundational to America. It is appalling that H.R. 5129 strikes current law protections for faith-based organizations who have a long history of serving those in need. https://t.co/2LrjlfKxEg

During #NationalPoliceWeek, I want to give a heartfelt thank you to all the men and women who serve and protect our communities. We are so grateful for the sacrifices you make each day. I’m proud to always back the blue. https://t.co/KbW60dOqrH

The same week that gas prices hit a record high, the Biden administration cancels oil and gas lease sales.

If President Biden was serious about lowering prices, he would be encouraging—not restricting—American energy production.

https://t.co/6imhwyB70c

Amid another mounting crisis—a nationwide shortage of baby formula—President Biden is once again caught flat-footed with no plan. His failed leadership is a disaster for families. 

Joined @cathymcmorris in demanding the Biden Admin take immediate action to address this shortage. https://t.co/8VE3VCyC7S
Unreal. Just one more reason the @DHSgov  "Disinformation Department” should not exist. https://t.co/ENRHnK0Uvp
